name: DispatchPredicate
desc: Logical conditions to evaluate within a given execution context.

items.name: case onQueue(DispatchQueue)
items.desc: A predicate that indicates the evaluated context is the associated dispatch queue.

items.name: case onQueueAsBarrier(DispatchQueue)
items.desc: A predicate that indicates the evaluated context is the associated dispatch queue as part of a barrier operation.

items.name: case notOnQueue(DispatchQueue)
items.desc: A predicate that indicates the evaluated context is not the associated dispatch queue.
